definitions.definition: A person seeking refuge (as for shelter or protection ), especially in a foreign country , out of fear or prospect of political, religious persecution , war , natural disaster , etc.
A person who is fleeing from justice , punishment deemed righteous, etc.; a runaway , a fugitive .

main_definition: ( attributive , also figurative ) A person seeking refuge (as for shelter or protection ), especially in a foreign country , out of fear or prospect of political, religious persecution , war , natural disaster , etc. [from 1680s]
secondary_definitions: ( derogatory , by extension ) A person who is fleeing from justice , punishment deemed righteous, etc.; a runaway , a fugitive . [from 1750s]
